chapters.title: Segment 13 (pages 217-234)
chapters.summary:
A striking feature of subsumption architecture design is that we split the agent not
into layers corresponding to information flow, but rather make a decomposition based
on the desired class of behaviors that we want the agent to haveâ€”its competences.
tion based on program flow would be as shown in Figure 3.3.1.
The planner sends a predetermined plan to executor modules that will carry out the
new percepts and actions are added, the planner may face a combinatorial explosion.
Execute Plan
FIGURE 3.3.1 Decomposition of a shooter agent based on program flow.
A decomposition based on competences is shown in Figure 3.3.2.
Replanning is also not a problem, as the system is fast and all lay-
